name: Steel Farm
description:
You play as a person indebted to a casino and now has to farm in a monster-ridden land to pay back your debt. You can place buildings and buy upgrades in the process to make it easier.

Controls

 - Press E to open and close shop

- Press Space to select and deslect harvest tool 

- Press 1,2,3 to choose available seeds

- Press Q to choose the option to plant seeds, which will grow overtime and bring more value.

- Left click to shoot and interact with object, such as placing bought valuables and harvesting.

- Enemies will come as waves with random timings, targeting your plants frst, then you.

Credits:

- Frozen Taurus - assetpack (greens, trees): https://frozentaurus.itch.io/frozentauruss-grass-tile-set 

- Sandesu - assetpack (farming tools): https://vayasandesu.itch.io/farm-tool-icon-24x24 

- Gustavo Vituri - assetpack (tiny ranch buildings, tiny ranch crops): https://gvituri.itch.io/tiny-ranch 

- BlackSpire Studio - assetpack (rooms): https://blackspirestudio.itch.io/medieval-pixel-art-asset-free 

- 0x72 - assetpack (monsters): https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-dungeon-tileset (edited)

II. Audio:

- Mixkit (sound effects)

- Jim Hall, Three Chain links (background music: SC-5588 and The Story Thus Far)
